name: Beef with Chris - Endless Jump Challenge
name_original: Beef with Chris - Endless Jump Challenge
description:
Play the most viral new game! See how far you can go!

Download now and let's play!

How to Play
●Tap at the correct time to jump platforms
●Collect coins to unlock new characters!
●Randomized levels make it unique and challenging!

Features
●Sleek and easy to use UI
●Addictive and fun gameplay, suitable for all ages!
●Great casual game to play at any time!

Don't wait now, download this game NOW!
